item.title: Hello, my name is David Kua and I...
item.description:
• recently graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the University of Toronto.
  • am a co-organizer of the Toronto chapter of Papers We Love and was previously a co-organizer of the Go Toronto meetup.
  • am an ex-conference organizer. I was previously…
    • the Director of Speakers for CUSEC 2016.
    • a Speakers Team Member for CUSEC 2015.
    • the University of Toronto’s Head Delegate for CUSEC 2014.
  • bake some mean chocolate-oatmeal-toffee cookies.
  • looking for my first full-time software development position, my resume can be found here.

Feel free to contact me using any of the methods below.
